overview: A Classic tale of love, lust, desire and sex. This folklore is staged in medieval times starring a cast of hot repressed women with the strong burning desire to have their chastity belts relinquished. During their sexual exploration they act on their deepest desires. They're fantasies become reality in smoldering sex. Watch a quiet dinner explode into an all out action packed fuck fest.
title: Decameron 3: Tales of Desire
